body: Ujjwal Acharya questions the newly introduced practice of two dailies of Nepal - Kantipur and The Kathmandu Post - where readers can send their feedback on opinion pieces and editorial via SMS.
original_body: Ujjwal Acharya questions the newly introduced practice of two dailies of Nepal - Kantipur and The Kathmandu Post - where readers can send their feedback on opinion pieces and editorial via SMS.
title: Nepal: Feedback On Newspaper Articles Via SMS

sentence: Ujjwal Acharya questions the newly introduced practice of two dailies of Nepal - Kantipur and The Kathmandu Post - where readers can send their feedback on opinion pieces and editorial via SMS.
